精糖: (せいとう) - refined sugar; sugar refining

精習: (せいしゅう) - (careful, diligent, intensive) practice or exercises

精通: (せいつう) - acquaintance/having knowledge/being expert/being versed in/conversant; first ejaculation

精進: (そうじ) - concentration/diligence/devotion; asceticism/zeal in one's quest for enlightenment; adherence to a vegetarian diet

精進日: (しょうじんび) - day of abstinence
精進潔斎: (しょうじんけっさい) - (yoji) purifying oneself (religiously) by abstaining from eating meat

精進落ち: (しょうじんおち) - first meal (including meat or fish) taken after a period of abstinence
精進落とし: (しょうじんおとし) - allowing oneself meat, fish or alcohol after a period of abstaining

精鋭軍: (せいえいぐん) - elite force; elite troops

精霊会: (しょうりょうえ) - (esp. 精霊会)  Bon Festival; (esp. 聖霊会) Buddhist service for the anniversary of the death of Shotoku Taishi (orig. the 22nd day of the 2nd month of the lunar calendar)
精霊崇拝: (せいれいすうはい) - spiritism; worship of the dead
精霊棚: (しょうりょうだな) - shelf with offerings for welcoming the spirits of one's ancestors during the Bon Festival
精霊流し: (しょうりょうながし) - floating lanterns or offerings for the spirits of the deceased
精霊舟: (しょうりょうぶね) - straw boat for one's ancestral spirits to sail in
精霊船: (しょうりょうぶね) - straw boat for one's ancestral spirits to sail in
精霊送り: (しょうりょうおくり) - sending off the spirits of the dead

精霊飛蝗擬: (ショウリョウバッタモドキ) - Gonista bicolor (species of grasshopper resembling the Oriental longheaded locust)
精霊飛蝗擬き: (ショウリョウバッタモドキ) - Gonista bicolor (species of grasshopper resembling the Oriental longheaded locust)
精髄: (せいずい) - essence; kernel; spirit; pith
精魂を傾ける: (せいこんをかたむける) - to put one's heart and soul into something
